TopicTitle: More Easter eggs and discoverable places please

Articles.Content: I wonder if doing this would require some massive update?
It would take some work but I agree filling out the worlds with fun things to discover is would be a nice move.
I would have no issue whatsoever paying for an expansion if thats what it takes.
Hopefully, now we are free of the constraints of 32bit, these things can become a possibility.
Agreed!  I think I've found all the ones we have now... I would love to have some new stuff to try and hunt down!
A magic boulder with a better collision mesh to the old one (and better textures) would be cool.
